body: I think `temp_retainable_list` would be pretty clear. `list_of_retainable` doesn't imply that they won't be freed when it's destructed.
body_html: I think temp_retainable_list would be pretty clear. list_of_retainable doesn't imply that they won't be freed when it's destructed.
body_text: I think temp_retainable_list would be pretty clear. list_of_retainable doesn't imply that they won't be freed when it's destructed.
